Title: Yongary, Monster from the Deep
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Actors: Yeong-il Oh, Jeong-im Nam, Soon-jae Lee, Moon Kang
Plot: Earthquakes in central Korea turn out to be the work of Yongary, a prehistoric gasoline-eating reptile that soon goes on a rampage through Seoul.
